First time meeting: You don't seem to be corrupted by the arcane powers here.
Nope. I wasn’t stupid or desperate enough to accept the Arcane Benefits Package they offered me.
I figured we'd be seeing someone like you after what happened to the last agent they sent.
Do you know what happened to him?
Some fool here killed him. You'll find his body on the third floor.
Let me impart some of my power to you. There's enough that needs cleaning around here without adding your corpse to the list.
Talk to me again if you ever want to change where you have allocated your power. I can reset you back to a clean slate.
Repeatable on 1st floor
How's that shield working for you? Hopefully it will keep you alive.
Do you want me to reset your levels?
Meet on 2nd floor
Hey Ernie, I have a question for you. With everything going on here, why haven’t you left?
Eh, this isn’t that bad. You should have seen my last job.
What was your last job?
You could say I was a janitor. I try not to dwell on the past too much.
Actually, I have a memento from my past that I’ve been trying to get rid of that I think you would appreciate.
Repeatable on 2nd floor
Do you want me to clean up your powers?
Meet on 3rd floor
I noticed you've picked up some of those patches that started this whole mess.
Yeah, they've been very useful so far.
I'll expand your capacity for using them. But you should still be careful, those things can really mess with a person's mind.
How do you know how to do things like that?
My last job came with a hefty benefits package similar to the one Patchwork Gary sold to this company’s CEO. When I realized the effect the magic was having on my mind I quit.
Really, you’re doing me a favor by taking this power off my hands.
Repeatable on 3rd floor
Do you want me to clean up your powers?
Meet on 5th floor
You made to the top floor, now you just have to find the CEO. He's quite powerful, I'll expand your capacity for using patches again.
Repeatable on 5th floor
Try not to get lost. Geometry doesn't seem to work quite right on this floor.
Do you want me to clean up your powers?
